original_title: 愛しのAVギャル～林由美香編
overview: Short film "My beloved AV gal - Yumika Hayashi" included in the Yumika 1997 DVD by Katsuyuki Hirano. "My beloved AV gal" (愛しのAVギャル) is an omnibus project by three directors Akira Takatsuki (高槻彰), Company Matsuo (カンパニー松尾) and Katsuyuki Hirano (平野勝之) for which each director was to shoot their beloved AV gal. For this and as a continuation of "Yumika", two years after their bicycle trip, Katsuyuki Hirano and Yumika Hayashi went out on a bicycle trip again.
title: My beloved AV gal - Yumika Hayashi
